item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:230 Chances: CNH Industrial NV is showing promising low-cost stocks according to analysts. CNH’s partnership with the Catholic University of Cordoba (UCC) is set to educate Argentina’s next generation of farmers. CNH’s farming innovations have won six 2024 AE50 awards from the American Society of Agricultural and Biological Engineers.
